entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 early in the morning. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
